__NOTOC__{{codepointer|Special action}}void '''A_Log''' (string ''whattoprint'' [, bool ''local''])
==Usage== [[Log|Logs]] a string to the console and displays it on the screen.
The printed text can be formatted by using the [[Print#Escape_sequence|escape characters]], in a similar manner to how it is done with {{c|[[Print]]}} and {{c|[[Log]]}} [[Built-in ACS functions|ACS functions]].
===Parameters=== *''whattoprint'': The string to log. *''local'': If {{c|true}}, the string is logged if the player is either looking out the calling actor's eyes, or the calling actor is the player and the player is looking out the eyes of a non-[[monster]] actor. Default is {{c|false}}.
== Examples ==
TNT1 A 0 [[A_Log]]("Hello World")
This will log the above string, with {{c|Hello}} colored in red and {{c|World}} in blue. TNT1 A 0 [[A_Log]]("\cGHello \cHWorld")
